ru: Обе стопы отведите назад и колени опустите.
en: Move both feet back and lower your knees to the ground.
enSynonyms: Shift both feet rearward and bring your knees down gently.
Step both feet backwards and settle your knees onto the mat.
Guide both feet behind you and ease your knees into a lowered position.
Draw both feet back and descend your knees softly to the floor.
Send both feet backward and allow your knees to rest on the surface.
